app.title: IAMEDIC

studies.createNewStudyDescription: Start a new medical imaging analysis study.

user.name: Name

studyCreateDialog.studyAliasMaxLength: Study alias must be less than 255 characters

storageUsage.storageRunningLow: Storage is running low. Consider cleaning up old files.

mediaUpload.dragAndDropFiles: Drag and drop your media files here

mediaUpload.fileSizeExceeded: File size must be less than 1GB
mediaUpload.unsupportedImageFormat: Unsupported image format. Supported: JPEG, PNG, GIF, BMP, TIFF, WebP, SVG, ICO
mediaUpload.unsupportedVideoFormat: Unsupported video format. Supported: MP4, AVI, MOV, WMV, WebM, 3GP, FLV, MKV, OGG, MPEG
mediaUpload.unsupportedFileType: File must be an image or video
mediaUpload.storageAlmostFullUpload: Storage is almost full ({percent}% used). Some uploads may fail.
mediaUpload.storageLowUpload: Storage is running low ({percent}% used). Consider cleaning up old files.

mediaGallery.unsavedChangesMessage: You have unsaved changes. Are you sure you want to close without saving?

doctorRegistration.profileSubmitted: Doctor profile submitted successfully. Your registration is now pending review.

doctorRegistration.registrationApprovedContactAdmin: Your registration has been approved. Contact an administrator if you need to make changes.
